description: All key concepts of Digital Signal Processing （DSP）are covered in the course. Practical problems will be presented and solved. Advanced applications of DSP for sound and images are also investigated.
prerequisites: Matlab programming skills are recommended but not essential for the students taking this course.

syllabus.zh:
1.數位訊號處理簡介
2.離散時間序列與LTI系統及其運算
3.離散時間系統之時域與頻域分析
4.離散傅利葉轉換和快速傅利葉轉換及其運用
5. Z轉換與其運用
6.數位濾波器設計與其運用
syllabus.en:
1. Crash Course in Digital Signal Processing

2. Analog-to-Digital and Digital-to-Analog Conversion

3. Digital Signals

4. Difference Equations and Filtering

5. Convolution and Filtering

6. Z Transforms

7. Fourier Transforms and Filter Shape

8. Digital Signal Spectra

9. Finite Impulse Response Filters

10. Infinite Impulse Response Filters

11. DFT and FFT Processing

12. Introduction to Audio Signal Processing

13. Introduction to Image Processing

Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Digital Image Fundamentals
Week 3. Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain (1)
Week 4. Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain (2)
Week 5. Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain (1)
Week 6. Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain (2)
Week 7. Color Image Processing (1)
Week 8. Color Image Processing (2)
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Color Image Processing (3)
Week 11. Morphological Image Processing (1)
Week 12. Morphological Image Processing (2)
Week 13. Image Segmentation (1)
Week 14. Image Segmentation (2)
Week 15. Image Pattern Classification(1)
Week 16. Image Pattern Classification(2)
Week 17. Image Pattern Recognitin
Week 18. Final Exam

teachingAndAssessment.objective: 了解數位影像處理系統的種類或相關應用
否了解訊號方塊圖、差分方程式的表示法、及轉移函數的意義
了解系統時域脈衝響應與頻譜響應之關係
了解FIR濾波器與IIR濾波之區別，及基本設計方法
